name: S3WebsiteConfigurationRoutingRulesProperty
description: The RoutingRules property is an embedded property of the Amazon S3 Website Configuration Property property. This property describes the redirect behavior and when a redirect is applied.

properties.name: RedirectRule
properties.desc: Redirect requests to another host, to another page, or with another protocol.
properties.type: Amazon S3 Website Configuration Routing Rules Redirect Rule Property

properties.name: RoutingRuleCondition
properties.desc: Rules that define when a redirect is applied.
properties.type: Amazon S3 Website Configuration Routing Rules Routing Rule Condition Property
